## Column {data-width="600"}

# Data

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(lubridate)


start_data <- read_csv("../Dataout/all_events.csv") |> 
  select(date, title, discipline, competition, name, country, club, stage, routine_number,
         mark_total, mark, number_elements, execution, T, D, H) |> 
  mutate(year = lubridate::year(date))
  
compact_data <- start_data |> 
  select(-c(year))

updateData <- reactive(
  compact_data)
```

## Column

### Event Title - Date

```{r}
renderDT(
  updateData(), rownames = F, extensions = 'Buttons', filter="top", editable=T,
  options = list(

    buttons = c('csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'),
    lengthMenu = list(c(10,50,100,-1),c(10,50,100,"All"))
  )
)
```
